climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: TAMPAX Pearl Ultra tampons have a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen
Anti-Slip Grip for easy tampon insertion
FormFit gently expands to your individual shape.
Free of perfume and chlorine bleaching, with a core free of dyes* (*Braid has skin-friendly pigments). Clinically tested gentle on skin and designed with your body in mind
Tampax Feminine Products are now HSA-/FSA-Eligible in the US
body.description: Get outstanding protection and comfort with TAMPAX Pearl. Free of perfume and chlorine bleaching, TAMPAX Pearl tampons are clinically tested gentle on skin and are designed with your body in mind. Featuring a LeakGuard Braid, TAMPAX Pearl tampons channel potential leaks back into the core free of dyes*, giving you up to eight hours of protection even on your heaviest days. Their FormFit design gently expands to your individual shape, while their Smooth Removal Layer gives you amazing comfort even on your lightest days. *Braid has skin-friendly pigments

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Ultras are the way to go, in my opinion, you forget that you even have one in! So much that sometimes it could go hours without having to take it out. Which I know that's not too great for you but oh well there are worse things ya know. I mean think about it, I'm kinda being sustainable, the less I use, less waste is produced. I had found out recently that at the waste plant, whatever you call it, they sort through our waste ya know, and they have to dig out each individual tampon because they really aren't flushable. But this fact not only made me think about my waste production through my monthly ritual, but how the movie finding nemo lied to me also it makes no sense. I was fed this idea that all toilets led to the ocean, and how that was one of their plans to escape, but if that was true there would be a whole ocean full of tampons. Now I wonder how many ultras it would take to absorb the whole ocean. That would be a good promo/marketing thing. Someone write that down. But in all seriousness when I flushed my dead beta fish pickles I really thought that he would go back to the ocean, even though he was a freshwater fish, I thought maybe the saltyness could revitalize him, like electrocute him. But all in all don't trust that tiny clown fish nemo. Trust in the fact that the Ultras are the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WAY CHEAPER THAN VONS
reviews.reviewText: Tampax Pearl Tampons with LeakGuard Braid in Ultra Absorbency are a dependable and highly effective choice for managing heavy flow during your menstrual cycle. Here's why I've been consistently satisfied with these tampons:1. Superior Absorbency: The Ultra absorbency level is perfect for those heavy flow days, providing reliable protection to keep you feeling confident and worry-free. These tampons can handle even the most challenging days of your period.2. Comfortable Design: Tampax Pearl's smooth plastic applicator ensures a comfortable and easy insertion process. The rounded tip and grip make it user-friendly and reduce any discomfort during application.3. Leak Protection: The LeakGuard Braid is a game-changer. It offers exceptional protection against leaks, even on your heaviest flow days. This extra layer of security provides peace of mind, especially when you're on the move.4. Discreet Packaging: The packaging is compact and discreet, making it easy to carry in your purse or pocket. It's convenient for changing your tampon without drawing attention.5. Hygienic Applicator: The fully enclosed applicator keeps things clean and hygienic, ensuring that you never have to touch the tampon directly. This is a significant advantage in terms of hygiene.6. Unscented: I appreciate that these tampons are unscented, which is more comfortable for sensitive users. They don't introduce any unnecessary fragrances or potential irritants.7. Odor Control: Tampax Pearl offers effective odor control, preventing any unwanted smells during your period.8. Economical Package: The 45-count package is a good value for the price. It ensures you have an adequate supply for your entire cycle without the need for frequent trips to the store.In conclusion, Tampax Pearl Tampons with LeakGuard Braid in Ultra Absorbency, Unscented, 45 Count are a top-tier choice for managing heavy menstrual flow. They provide exceptional absorbency, comfort, and leak protection, all while maintaining excellent hygiene and discretion. If you're looking for a dependable option to tackle those heavy flow days, I wholeheartedly recommend Tampax Pearl Ultra Absorbency tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Periods are heavy and these help. Less leaks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The one I buy time and time again
reviews.reviewText: I started buying on Amazon after it became difficult to find this product in store. It gets delivered to my door and despite the risk of getting toxic shock syndrome from higher absorption, I’ve never had any issues changing tampons regularly. It has been great to buy these and almost forget I’m menstruating. I do recommend using a pad combined with the tampon just for any accidents and I’ve never been able to fully avoid leaks, I don’t know if user error or product error but with a pad I don’t feel the bleeding in comparison to pad alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You can never go wrong with Tampax Tampons and the great price along with quick delivery win win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fast, discreet shipping. Price was so much lower than buying at any local store and auth high quantity boxes, I won't have to order again any time soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Using with the discontinuation of Kotex Super Plus
reviews.reviewText: Kotex super plus… RIP … gen x ladies know what’s up and I’m praying for menopause because there is no true replacement for that tampon. THIS one KIND OF a comes close. It’s bigger. It can be painful at times and heavy flow women know the struggle …. This one DOES work as well as the OG Kotex super plus but with some discomfort. I do rely on these for the first couple of days and they have held up to a monster flow with minimal leakage. Really this is as close as you’re going to get to old school Kotex super plus

reviews.reviewTitle: You get exactly what you ordered.
reviews.reviewText: This is it. How great tampons can be? 😀

reviews.reviewTitle: 45 count in each box not 50 count
reviews.reviewText: The Title and choice said 50 count x 3 pack so I expected 3 boxes with 50count in each box but actually 45count boxes x 3.
Written pack of 3 of 45 pieces but delivered just 1 pack of 45 pieces. Wrong description. Too expensive for just 1 pack.

I have a very heavy flow due to fibroids. I mostly wear this at night with a back up pad so I can get a longer night sleep. Or if I need to leave the house for more than an hour, I feel safe from an accident with these

I have heavy flow and was looking for the purple o.b. tampons (super) but couldn't find them online so settled on these. The Tampax tampons are comfortable and are about the same in terms of absorbency. They are bulky with the applicator and packaging, which is annoying, but they do suit my needs.
